Live Fully at Marriott International – #1 Leader in HospitalityAt Marriott International, you have the opportunity to grow in your career, work with teammates that feel like family, and help make our world a better place.The Marriott International HQ, located at 7750 Wisconsin Avenue, Bethesda, Maryland, 20814 is currently hiring a Senior Director, Data Strategy and Data Management.Responsibilities include:The Senior Director, Data Strategy & Management is responsible for directing a data-domain team charged with developing best practices in the use of data for reporting, analytics and modeling of customer value so that the results can be applied for business purposes such as targeted marketing activities for current and prospective Marriott customers. The position has four major areas of accountability:Guide the strategy and management of domain data for insights into customer value, customer behavior, customer acquisition, customer management, and promotional response for use in marketing campaigns, both individually and in support of the efforts of other team members.Collaborate with team members from the other data domains and areas including Analytics, Global Technology, Platforms, Privacy and other departments across Marriott to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of digital marketing, traditional marketing, and generally provide insights that help guide ways to improve the guest experience by improving existing processes and supporting the implementation of new tools, data sources, and business processes.Support efforts to integrate data sources across sales, revenue management, marketing, financial, and guest experience.Enable the adoption of innovative best-practices and their application to data domains that add value to the business disciplines.The incumbent is responsible for the management of a highly talented data and analytic team, helping them to keep up-to-date technically and motivating the application of new knowledge and innovative research and statistical techniques to surface novel consumer insights.
CANDIDATE PROFILE Education and Experience Required10+ years of professional experience, demonstrating progressive career growth and a pattern of exceptional performance in research consulting and analytically-heavy positions.4-year degree from an accredited university.
Demonstrated ability to conduct and engage in data, analytics, technology with practical applications to business needs.Significant proficiency in data programming languages (SQL, Python, R, or equivalent)Proficiency with SnowflakeEducation and Experience PreferredAdvanced degree with a rigorous emphasis on quantitative or technical content and methods (e.g. computer science, data science, mathematics, operations research, economics, statistics, or equivalent).Experience with and comfort using statistical analysis and data mining techniques.Experience with advanced SQL programming, cloud databases, process optimization, business intelligence platforms, visualization software, in-database analytics, or other analytical tools.Experience analyzing web clickstream data.Experience working with a production relational database or data warehouse.A broad understanding of the latest technologies used for data engineering and data analytics.Experience or knowledge in Cloud Technologies (AWS, GCP, Azure).Experience and understanding of data products / solutions.
CORE WORK ACTIVITIES Develop and manage the work of the data domain teams for business value.Work with business partners to understand their business problems and opportunities to tailor data and modeling efforts to meet their needs, balancing multiple priorities and effectively communicating the benefits and limits of predictive models, optimization, and personalization.Guide the development of data products for customer loyalty, value, customer behavior, and responsiveness to marketing promotions. Initiate and manage cross-departmental relationships to spur collaboration between projects.Prioritize the implementation of analytic projects to meet the demands of business stakeholders.Develop systems and technologies that reduce manual processes and improve data quality.Support team members in developing methodologies for ensuring clean and accurate data, for reporting, analytics and other purposes.Provide input and assistance to other teams regarding projects.Manage and implement work and projects as assigned.Generate and provide accurate and timely results in the form of reports, presentations, etc.Analyze information and evaluates results to choose the best solution and solve problems.Provide timely, accurate, and detailed status reports as requested. Apply technical expertise to solve business problems and evaluate their effectivenessDevelops and executes strategies for answering difficult business problems through the use and application of data driven methodologiesProvides technical expertise and support to key stakeholders/departments.Identifiesthe right data tools and methods for a given problem and consult with other teams to arrive at the right measurement metrics to evaluate success.Keeps up-to-date technically and applies new knowledge for continuous improvement. Continuously improve process and practices associated with the application of advanced tools and technologies to solve business problems.Interact with multiple teams in Information Technology, and Business disciplines to automate the execution of data flows and deliver data products and solutions.Develop data monitoring and data quality processes to ensure the delivery and availability of high quality business relevant data for reporting, analytics, and other uses.Understand and apply best practices in data-engineering and data analytics. Champion leadership development and workforce planning priorities for team by assisting in the assessment, selection, and development of diverse, high-caliber talent.Develops and leads others both formally and informally to support business needs and improve performance.Hire, retain, and continually develop diverse, high caliber talent that makes a strong, positive impact on the organization.Provide timely coaching and feedback. Additional ResponsibilitiesInforms and/or updates leaders on relevant information in a timely manner.Manages time effectively and conducts activities in an organized manner.Presents ideas, expectations and information in a concise, organized manner.Uses problem solving methodology for decision making and follow up.Performs other reasonable duties as assigned. California Applicants Only: The salary range for this position is $123,975.00 to $275,021.00 annually.Colorado Applicants Only: The salary range for this position is $123,975.00 to $250,016.00 annually.New York City & Westchester County, NY Applicants Only: The salary range for this position is $150,011.00 to $275,021.00 annually.Washington Applicants Only: The salary range for this position is $123,975.00 to $275,021.00 annually. In addition to the annual salary, the position will be eligible to receive an annual bonus and restricted stock units/stock grants. Employees will accrue 0.4616 PTO balance for every hour worked and eligible to receive minimum of 7 holidays annually. All locations offer coverage for medical, dental, vision, health care flexible spending account, dependent care flexible spending account, life insurance, disability insurance, accident insurance, adoption expense reimbursements, paid parental leave, educational assistance, 401(k) plan, stock purchase plan, discounts at Marriott properties, commuter benefits, employee assistance plan, and childcare discounts. Benefits are subject to terms and conditions, which may include rules regarding eligibility, enrollment, waiting period, contribution, benefit limits, election changes, benefit exclusions, and others. Marriott International is consistently recognized as an employer of choice globally by FORTUNE magazine, DiversityInc and Great Places to Work Institute, among others.Chat, engage and follow us on social media. | Facebook | Twitter | LinkedIn | InstagramVisit www.marriott.com/careers to learn more about our workplace culture and career opportunities.Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law. Marriott International considers for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.
